form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Central Intelligence Agency Personnel Form, A10 294862

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Rev. ED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUS' District File No. 0300-New York Immigration and Naturalization Service A10 294862 Sub-office Date Nov. 13, 1956 DIRECTOR, CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY, 2430 E Street, N.W., Washington, D.C. Attention: ASSISTANT DIRECTOR Please furnish any derogatory information that may be contained in your files concerning the following person: NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL STATUS MAR DOO 1908 PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state & country) PRESENT NATIONALITY S Lung Deng. Toy Shan, D W China Chinese ALIASES (Identify maiden names or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (include present address, if known) MAR AU SANG MA GWOON GOON, DEC NG SHR DEG HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIF YNG MARKS OR SCARS 516" 140 brn blk yellow mole over right eyebrow RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO Soon Hing Farm, Green Lawn, L.I., N.Y. 9/10/56 date 665 E. 156 St, Bronx, NY 4/56 9/56 831 E. 153 St., Bronx, NY 1/56 4/56 EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO Soon Hing Farm, Green Lawn, LI, NY laborer 9/10/56 date Ying Lee Shirt Pressing, Jamaica, LI, NY presser 4/56 9/56 PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) crewman SPOUSE (Full name & any other names used, & present address, if not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH Wong Lai X ung, Toyshan, China APR 1 1957 46 PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state & country) NO PERTIMENT Toyshan, Kwangtung, Ch ina ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports) Assest tc., identify each) (If numerous, periods when previously in U.S.) REASON FOR REQUEST APPLICANT FOR: DEPORTATION BENEF. PB #: OTHER (Specify) PROCEEDINGS ADM. TO U.S. ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: FOR RELIEF OF NATZ. XX RETURN TO: (3) INVESTIGATIONS DIVISION U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service 119 St., N.E. Washington 25, D.C. CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY
